 42      stopButton = Button('Stop Animation') 
 43      speed = Range(0.01, 1.0)

 46                               Item('stopButton'),

 54 -    def __init__(self, tMin, tMax, *renderers): 

 55          """ 
 56          Initialise idle animator. 
 57   
 58          @param tMin: Time to start animation. 
 59          @param tMax: Time at which to wrap back to tMin. 
 60          @param renderers: List of L{AnimatedRenderer} objects. 
 61          """ 
 62          HasTraits.__init__(self) 
 63          self._renderers = renderers 
 64          self._tMin = tMin 
 65          self._tMax = tMax 
 66          self.speed = 1 
 67          self.time = tMin 
 68          self.playing = False 
 69          self._scene = mlab.gcf().scene 
 70          autoPositionCamera() 
 71          for r in self._renderers: 
 72              r.renderUpdate(self.time) 
 73          self.edit_traits() 

 74   

 75 -    def _startButton_fired(self): 

 76          self.playing = True 
 77          self.lastRenderTime = time.time() 
 78          wx.GetApp().Bind(wx.EVT_IDLE, self._onIdleEvent) 

 79   

 80 -    def start(self): 

 81          """ Start animation. """ 
 82          self._startButton_fired() 

 83   

 84 -    def _stopButton_fired(self): 

 85          wx.GetApp().Bind(wx.EVT_IDLE, None) 
 86          self.playing = False

 88 -    def stop(self): 

 89          """ Stop animation. """ 
 90          self._stopButton_fired() 

 91   

 92 -    def _onIdleEvent(self, event): 

 93          if self.playing: 
 94              self._scene.disable_render = True 
 95              timeNow = time.time() 
 96              t = self.time + (timeNow - self.lastRenderTime) * self.speed 
 97              if t > self._tMax: 
 98                  self.time = self._tMin + t - self._tMax 
 99              else: 
100                  self.time = t 
101              self.time = t % self._tMax 
102              self.lastRenderTime = timeNow 
103              for r in self._renderers: 
104                  r.renderUpdate(self.time) 
105              self._scene.disable_render = False 
106              event.RequestMore() 

107   

108 -def autoPositionCamera(): 

109      """ 
110      Set camera position looking along the x-axis. 
111      """ 
112      s = mlab.gcf().scene 
113      s.disable_render = True 
114      mlab.view(90,90,distance='auto',focalpoint='auto') 
115      mlab.roll(0) 
116      s.disable_render = False

238 -    def renderSnapshot(self, t):

254 -def renderSolenoidCoil(solenoid, segments=1000, **kwargs): 

255      """ 
256      Visualise L{SolenoidMagneticField} model coil in 3D. 
257   
258      @param solenoid: L{SolenoidMagneticField} to render. 
259      @param segments: Number of coil segments to generate. Larger numbers 
260          result in smoother coils. 
261      @param kwargs: Additional keywords to pass to 
262          L{mayavi.mlab.plot3d}. 
263      """ 
264      coils = 2*solenoid.b * solenoid.n 
265   
266      z = np.linspace(-solenoid.b,solenoid.b,segments) 
267      theta = np.linspace(0,coils*2*np.pi,segments) 
268      x = solenoid.a * np.cos(theta) 
269      y = solenoid.a * np.sin(theta) 
270   
271      x,y,z = solenoid.transform.apply(np.vstack((x,y,z))) 
272   
273      if not 'tube_radius' in kwargs:kwargs['tube_radius']=0.001 
274      if not 'opacity' in kwargs:kwargs['opacity']=0.5 
275      mlab.plot3d(x,y,z,**kwargs)
